summary: 15 months after the apocalypse, a group of survivors are forced to take refuge in an abandoned school, where they encounter a mysterious zombie with the power to bring the undead back to life.
cast: Eric Colvin|Jim Sweeney|Danny Brown|Simon Burbage|Jade Colucci|Joe Rainbow|Rachel Nottingham|Shamiso Mushambi|Georgia Winters|Rupert Phelps|Jamie Frampton|Kate Korbel|Andy Bazire|Ian McIntyre|Jake Hawkins|Andy Phelps|Alex Alexandria|Hetty Austin|Nik Aves|Stuart Beadle|Laura Beech|James Burton|Jarrad Clarke|Rob Clarke|Sam Clarke|Thomas Clarke|Randip Dhesi|Mike Duran|Louise Edge|Matt Emeny|Callum English|Fin Ferrol|Ryan Fleming|Eddie Fogg|Elizabeth Foley|Linda Fraser|Chris Gatland|Tim Gatland|Daryl Gorman|Chelsea Grant|Susannah Halley|Alex Hawkins|Rosanna Hawkins|Wayne Kirkland|Martin Lavender|Mark Lawrence|Claire Lincoln|James Livermore|Chris Luckins|Emma Luckins|Karen Luckins|Hannah Matheson|Charlie McIntyre|Ross McNeil|Caroline Melia|Paul Oz|Joseph Patterson|Ben Perry|Leif Phelps|Lucilla Phelps|Jason Porter|Sam Purnell|Melissa Rochoux|Nicolas Rochoux|Ian Rummey|Chloe Sharp|Alexis Shepperd|Emily Smith|Hetty Smith|Natalie Smith|Sam Smith|Tom Smith|Sam Sparks|Mary Stone|Lauren Thompson|Peter Thorburn|John Tinker|Lee Turner|Mike Turnham|Jon Tydeman|Richard Uphill|Lesedi Vine|Ross Wheeler|Gemma Williams
title: Zombie Resurrection
